p: Case fatality rates varied from 71% during outbreaks in 1976â€“1986 to 62% during the later years. However, there was no statistically significant change over time (OR in 2019 vs 1976: 1.6 (95% CI 1.5 to 1.6)). The overall trend from 1976 to 2019 outbreaks shows a linear rate of change over time ( table 3, figure 3).
